# Curse of Keeping (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Curse Spells|curse]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 2]], [[2nd Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Black Markets, pg. 30

You curse the target with the inability to sell, barter, or give away any item it owns, other than ordinary currency, for as long as the spell remains in effect. The target cannot sell, trade, drop, or give away possessions. The target can purchase items using ordinary currency but can’t then sell the purchased items. The target can accept gifts from others but can’t offer anything in exchange. A *curse of keeping* can be ended by *[[Break Enchantment (Spell)|break enchantment]], [[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]], [[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]], [[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]],* or *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]*. *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|Dispel magic]]* does not affect a *curse of keeping.*
